raw_comment: 15-24 year old and 40+ years old pessimism and optimism percentage out of 21 countries.
ace_sentences: The comment refers to people who are 15-24 years old.
The comment refers to people who are 40 years old or older.
For each of the 21 countries, there is a pessimism percentage for people who are 15-24 years old.
For each of the 21 countries, there is an optimism percentage for people who are 15-24 years old.
For each of the 21 countries, there is a pessimism percentage for people who are 40 years old or older.
For each of the 21 countries, there is an optimism percentage for people who are 40 years old or older.
